About

Let's get acquainted closer

Hello, my name is Ekaterina Yarmoshuk and I'm front end developer. I can build a responsive website for you. I'm trying to be passioned about combining beautiful code with beautiful design. I love learning new and better ways to create clean descriptive code so that anyone could understand it.

Portfolio

Some of my works

CoffeeStyle: a Responsive Coffee Mugs Shop Website

CoffeeStyle is a responsive website designed for multiple devices, platforms, and browsers.

Techniques
  • Responsive Web Design
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • Was build and developed with help of Gulp
  • CSS using Preprocessor SCSS
  • Semantic HTML5 Markup
  • Implementing a Product Cart (using javascript)
  • Horizontal-scrolling Carousel supporting touch interaction (without using javascript)
View Code

Magic: a Responsive Landing Website With Beatifull Parallax Effect

Magic is an attractive landing page with an impressive desing.

Techniques
  • Responsive Web Design
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • Was build and developed with help of Gulp
  • Preprocessor SCSS used
  • Parallax effect was made with help of GSAP (ScrollTrigger, ScrollSmoother Plagins)
  • The layers for the main banner were cut with help of Photoshop
  • BEM methodology used
View Code

Design: a Beautiful Interior Design Website

Design is a single page website built using HTML5, CSS Preprocessor SCSS. Its design includes responsive architecture and multi-device interaction support.

Techniques
  • Responsive Web Design
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • Was build and developed with help of Gulp
  • Used Preprocessor SCSS
  • Including flexbox and CSS Grid for layout
  • Semantic HTML5 Markup
  • BEM methodology used
  • Loading additional products from JSON file
  • Including Full Screen Slider (using slider Swiper)
  • Using the icon font generator service icomoon.io
  • Clean Code, All files are well commented and organized
View Code
